articles.description: Frustration with rising menu prices and ubiquitous tip prompts lead to a six-year low
articles.content: People are tipping less at restaurants than they have in at least six years, driven by fatigue over rising prices and growing prompts for tips at places where gratuities havent historically been expe… [+462 chars]

articles.title: As Netflix drops 'American Primeval,' how much do we know about its accuracy? - Deseret News
